order

Class MyOrdersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • order.MyOrdersController

  • public class MyOrdersController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for showing all orders of the logged in customer divides the orders to 3 accordions

    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0

    Matan Weisberg

      void initialize()
      This func initializes our controller loads all customer orders from DB add each order to correct accordion according to its flags set a listner for changing accordions set a listener for approving order arrived
